title: Introducing: STACEY
content:
Singer/Songwriter, STACEY, from Toronto translates the cold of Canada into an icy piano ballad titled “Worst Part.

” Harmonizing with herself over undulating piano melodies, Stacey sings “you leave me wanting more” and “I need you.” Producer Alex Bonenfant uses the same lo-fi, slightly distorted, vocals heard in his other projects including Metz and Crystal Castles. It’s a breathy ballad that truly leaves you wanting more and coincidentally thats the worst part.

author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d20
